title: Maʽalim ʽAli ʽAden
summary: Maʽalim ʽAli ʽAden is a Somali politician. He is the Deputy Minister for Religious Affairs of Somalia, having been appointed to the position on 6 February 2015 by Prime Minister Omar Abdirashid Ali Sharmarke.
content:
Maʽalim ʽAli ʽAden is a Somali politician. He is the Deputy Minister for Religious Affairs of Somalia, having been appointed to the position on 6 February 2015 by Prime Minister Omar Abdirashid Ali Sharmarke.
